structure.unit: PAYMENT, COLLECTION, AND REFUND OF TAXES

law.history: Repealed 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 71, effective January 1, 2010. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 274, effective June 17, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4136.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Death, resignation or removal of sheriff -- Sureties may nominate collector.
